actor_awards.notes: Won the 1932 Olympic Gold Medal for the 400-meter freestyle swimming event before becoming an actor. He is the only actor to play Tarzan, Flash Gordon, and Buck Rogers. Inducted into the International Swimming Hall of Fame in 1965.

filmography.title: Flash Gordon
filmography.role_description: The athletic hero who travels to the planet Mongo to stop the evil Emperor Ming from destroying Earth.
filmography.plot: Three people travel to the planet Mongo to fight the evil Emperor Ming the Merciless.

filmography.title: Buck Rogers
filmography.role_description: A pilot who is suspended in time and wakes up in the 25th century to fight a dictator.
filmography.plot: A 20th-century pilot wakes up 500 years in the future to help the world fight the outlaw army of a dictator.

filmography.title: Tarzan the Fearless
filmography.role_description: The legendary jungle hero who protects a woman searching for her father.
filmography.plot: A woman organizes an expedition into the jungle to find her father, who is researching a lost civilization, and encounters the Ape Man.

filmography.title: Flash Gordon's Trip to Mars
filmography.role_description: Flash returns to stop Ming from destroying Earth using a nitron lamp on Mars.
filmography.plot: Flash Gordon, Dale Arden, and Dr. Zarkov return to space to fix a ray that is sucking the nitrogen from Earth's atmosphere.

filmography.title: Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe
filmography.role_description: Flash battles Ming one last time to stop the 'Purple Death' plague.
filmography.plot: Flash Gordon fights to save the Earth from a plague known as the Purple Death, unleashed by Ming the Merciless.

filmography.title: King of the Jungle
filmography.role_description: A man raised by lions in Africa who is brought to civilization and forced to perform in a circus.
filmography.plot: A man raised by lions is captured and brought to the United States to be a circus attraction.

filmography.title: Million Dollar Legs
filmography.role_description: The athletic boyfriend of the President's daughter in this W.C. Fields comedy.
filmography.plot: The president of a small country enters his citizens in the Olympic games to save the national treasury.

filmography.title: Murders in the Zoo
filmography.role_description: A man who becomes the target of a jealous zoo owner who uses animals to dispatch his rivals.
filmography.plot: An insane zoologist and sports hunter uses the animals at a zoo to kill his wife's lovers.

filmography.title: Daughter of Shanghai
filmography.role_description: A government agent who assists Anna May Wong's character in exposing an alien smuggling ring.
filmography.plot: A woman goes undercover to expose the smugglers who killed her father.

filmography.title: Search for Beauty
filmography.role_description: An Olympic champion recruited to run a health magazine, only to be exploited by con artists.
filmography.plot: Two Olympic swimming champions are hired to edit a health magazine, unaware that the publishers are running a salacious racket.

filmography.title: Jungle Man
filmography.role_description: A doctor and jungle adventurer who protects an expedition from dangers.
filmography.plot: A jungle doctor fights to save an expedition from hostile natives and wild animals.

filmography.title: Billy the Kid Wanted
filmography.role_description: The famous outlaw who helps a group of homesteaders against a corrupt land baron.
filmography.plot: Billy the Kid and his pals help a group of farmers who are being terrorized by a land grabber.

filmography.title: Billy the Kid's Round-Up
filmography.role_description: Billy investigates a murder and corruption in a town controlled by a gang.
filmography.plot: Billy the Kid and his friends try to clean up a lawless town.

filmography.title: Sheriff of Sage Valley
filmography.role_description: Billy takes on the identity of a missing sheriff to stop a gang of outlaws.
filmography.plot: Billy the Kid assumes the identity of a captured outlaw to infiltrate a gang.

filmography.title: Western Cyclone
filmography.role_description: Billy is wrongly accused of a crime and must clear his name while fighting corruption.
filmography.plot: Billy the Kid is arrested for a crime he didn't commit, but the real criminals are still at large.

filmography.title: The Contender
filmography.role_description: A truck driver who becomes a professional boxer to pay for his son's military school tuition.
filmography.plot: A truck driver enters the boxing ring to make enough money to send his son to a military academy.

filmography.title: Wild Horse Phantom
filmography.role_description: A cowboy hero who tries to find the location of a hidden mine.
filmography.plot: Billy Carson helps an escaped convict find the money he hid in a mine before going to prison.

filmography.title: Oath of Vengeance
filmography.role_description: Billy Carson works to prevent a general store owner from stirring up an Indian war.
filmography.plot: Billy Carson and his sidekick Fuzzy Q. Jones try to stop a store owner who is selling guns to the Indians.

filmography.title: Gangster's Den
filmography.role_description: Billy Carson finds a job at a saloon only to discover the owner is blackmailing miners.
filmography.plot: Billy Carson and Fuzzy Jones investigate a saloon owner who is killing miners to take over their claims.

filmography.title: Gunfighters of Abilene
filmography.role_description: A gunfighter who must deal with his brother's disappearance and a land scheme.
filmography.plot: A gunfighter returns home to find his brother missing and his land targeted by a corrupt cattle baron.

filmography.title: The Bounty Killer
filmography.role_description: A veteran of the West appearing in this Techniscope western.
filmography.plot: An Easterner travels West and becomes a ruthless bounty hunter, eventually facing his own moral decline.

filmography.title: Arizona Raiders
filmography.role_description: A Union captain who recruits former Confederate soldiers to fight a renegade gang.
filmography.plot: An ex-Quantrill Raider is released from prison to hunt down the remnant of the gang in Arizona.

filmography.title: The Comeback Trail
filmography.role_description: A washed-up cowboy star recruited for a film by producers who secretly hope he dies during production.
filmography.plot: Two shady film producers hire a washed-up Western star for a movie, hoping the stunts will kill him so they can collect the insurance.

filmography.title: The Thundering Herd
filmography.role_description: A stagecoach driver in this Zane Grey adaptation.
filmography.plot: Buffalo hunters clash with Indians and outlaws on the plains.

filmography.title: The Alien Dead
filmography.role_description: A grumpy small-town sheriff dealing with a zombie outbreak in the swamps.
filmography.plot: A meteor strikes a houseboat in the swamps, turning the occupants into flesh-eating zombies.
